segments.text: Well I don ’ t think so . I don ’ t like it at all !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m afraid you ’ re being too particular about your food .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I eat dog food when my parents are out .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We ’ re in the same boat ! I ’ Ve eaten fast food the whole week . I hate it now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Poor us ! All this junk food lacks nutrition !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let ’ s dine out tonight for a change !
segments.speaker: S2
